description: Create a usage dashboard specified by workspaceId, accountId, and dashboard type.

workspace_id.description: The workspace ID of the workspace in which the usage dashboard is created.

dashboard_type.description: Workspace level usage dashboard shows usage data for the specified workspace ID. Global level usage dashboard shows usage data for all workspaces in the account.

dashboard_id.description: The unique id of the usage dashboard.
